title: Interview With General Flynn’s Lawyer Sidney Powell (Ep 1256)
description:
In this episode I interview General Mike Flynn’s attorney, Sidney Powell about the framing of her client. Sidney is the author of “Conviction Machine” available here: https://www.amazon.com/dp/1594038031/ref=cm_sw_r_cp_api_i_qmXXEbT9D422A
